text.0: great as he was soma hath gained strength by this high solemnity.
text.1: joyous he riseth like a bull.
text.2: his task is done his crushings of the dasyus are made manifest.
text.4: soon as his song of praise is born the soma indras juice becomes.
text.6: seer and sustainer he himself desireth riches for the sage.
text.8: fain would they both win riches as in races of the steeds in war.
text.9: thou art upon the conquerors side.
